channel.title: [FoL] FoL 22 - The Blue Dragon and Scorned Win!
channel.description:
# General Gameplay Information Host is Solic Co-host is Datbird
## Rules
1. Follow the Global Forum Rules 2. If you haven’t posted content in 36 hours, you’ll be prodded for inactivity. If you don’t respond to that prod in 12 hours, you will be force replaced. 3. No private messaging others in the game about the game. 4. Do not quote private host messages 5. Don’t throw the game. This includes any form of intent to make you or your faction lose 6. Refrain from posting so many times in a row. 7. Players are not allowed to use big letters. These are reserved for the host. 8. You are allowed to leave the game but doing it will net you a temporary blacklist meaning you can’t join a forum of lies for a while. Further leaving may net with a permanent blacklist 9. Lets all have fun and play together! 10. Do not edit or delete made posts. 11. Do not like posts in a thread if you are dead in that game.
## Gameplay
* Days last 72 hours, or until a majority is reached for execution. Nights last 24 hours. * All actions must be sent to the mod. * Unseen/Cult will talk through a special Discord server or forum message. * The priest will speak with the dead through a separate Discord server or forum message. * All classes will be used and will be used as they are found in the Class Cards Thread. * Recently changed classes will *NOT* be forcibly rolled and are not guaranteed unless stated.
## Executions
* To accuse someone say “/accuse [player]” or “/vote [player]” * Should the votes reach the majority, that player will be executed and the day will end.
## Picking a New King
* If there are less than 4 players a new king will not be selected. * When the king dies a 12 hour period starts. In this, players may vote in their class PM for who they want to become the next king. * Whoever receives the most votes in this period will be crowned king. If votes are tied, a king election will be held the next day to determine it.
## Action Results
## [Feedback List ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-hosting-feedback-guide/75082)
## Journals
* PM the host what you want on your journal. When you die, the last update to your journal will be revealed to everyone
## Classlist **King** **(65% <font color="steblue">Good</font>, 35% <font color="purple">Evil</font> / <font color="darkred">Devout</font>)** <font color="purple">**Mastermind**</font>/<font color="darkred">**Cult Leader**</font> <font color="purple">**Assassin**</font></font>/<font color="darkred">**Random Cult**</font> <font color="steblue">**Prince**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> / <font color="grey">**Random Neutral Non-Killer**</font> <font color="grey">**Random Neutral Non-Killer**</font> <font color="grey">**Neutral Killer**</font>
## [Classes](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-class-cards-now-officially-official/1998)
## Playerlist 1. ~~Frostwolf103~~ - Died Night 4 - [color=darkred]**The Cult Leader**[/color] 2. ~~Priestess~~ - Died Night 1 - [color=solblue]**The Prince**[/color] 3. Htm :crown: 4. ~~EndOfTheWorld~~ - Lynched Day 3 - [color=aquamarine]**The Warlock**[/color] 5. ~~AreteSlashStars~~ Died Night 3 - [color=solblue]**The Princess**[/color] 6. ~~Kape~~ - Died Night 3 - [color=solblue]**The Priest**[/color] 7. ~~Alice~~ - Died Night 3 - [color=darkred]**The Acolyte**[/color] 8. ~~Kai_5~~ - Lynched Day 5 - [color=black]**The Reaper**[/color] 9. Launchpad 10. ~~Andrej~~ - Lynched Day 2 - [color=purple]**The Assassin**[/color] 11. ~~Bazingaboy~~ Lynched Day 4 - [color=darkred]**The Cult Leader**[/color] 12. ~~Mincinmind~~ - Died Night 2 - [color=darkred]**The Cult Leader**[/color] 13. ~~Possessed~~ - Died Night 1 - [color=solblue]**The Noble**[/color] 14. WazzaAzza 15. ~~JakeTheWolfie~~ - Died Night 3 - [color=solblue]**The Maid**[/color] 16. Gikkle
### Backups: 1. Sulit 2. Hippolytus 3. Astand 4. Shurian
### Spectators: 1. Isaac_Gonzalez
----
# New player guide:
###### Posting this here, so I don't have to duplicate it 16 times in classcards.
Always ask the hosts when in doubt. We don’t mind if we get 20 mechanical questions a day from you to ensure that you understand how the game works.
Read the original post carefully as many questions are already answered in there.
[FoL Class Cards (Now Officially Official)](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-class-cards-now-officially-official/1998) is where all the classcards are that are possible.
There are definite deviations from Throne of Lies the game, although many many similarities persist.
We have even completely new classes like Priest, Archer, Demon etc., so be sure to look at this link carefully. Small deviations for existing classes exist as well to provide a more forum balanced game. An example is that a Knight can Cold Steel Night 1 already and a Physician’s Exhume only provides the faction of the dead person’s killer instead of the whole class.
The Cult functions very differently too and the following guide should provide some insight. Cult points were added to allow for better fakeclaiming potential.
![|20x20](https://forum.imperium42.com/user_avatar/forum.imperium42.com/marluxion/40/10921_2.png) [Cult Points - How do they work?](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/cult-points-how-do-they-work/62045) [Forum of Lies](https://forum.imperium42.com/c/forum-matches/forum-of-lies)
> mithras Cult Point Introduction corax What are Cult Points? Well, young disciple, I’m glad you asked! After being converted to the Cult, you receive a set number of Cult Points based on the class you were converted from. These can be found just below your Class Card in the [Class Card Thread](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-class-cards-now-officially-official/1998). Wowee, Mithras is great! How do I spend these points? At any time (Day, night, on trial, whenever!) via your Class Card DM you may spend your cult points into new abilities. You can take ANY ability…
Feedback is also heavily reduced in comparison to Throne of Lies. For an feedback (exhaustive for at least the BD) guide follow:
![|20x20](https://forum.imperium42.com/user_avatar/forum.imperium42.com/marluxion/40/10921_2.png) [Forum of Lies Hosting Feedback Guide](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-hosting-feedback-guide/75082) [Forum of Lies](https://forum.imperium42.com/c/forum-matches/forum-of-lies)
> IF AN INVESTIGATION FAILS FOR ANY REASON “You were unable to investigate your target.” IF AN INVESTIGATOR HAS THEIR TARGET SWAPPED “Your target was changed!" (They aren’t told who they were swapped to) IF AN INVESTIGATOR TARGETS A PHYLACTERY HOLDER “You feel a chill surrounding the target player. They are a Phylactery Holder for The Lich!” MAID Change Sheets: “Your targets were killed by the same player!” “Your targets were not killed by the same player!” Matchmake: “Your targets are comp…
Examples are that mainly investigative classes gain feedback. A butler occupying another player will not see if they are occupy immune or not. The player being occupied will not see that they are being occupied by anyone unless they are an investigative. Another example is that a Physician will not know whether their target was bleeding/poisoned and the target player will not know whether they are healed.
Trials also do not exist similar to Throne of Lies. That means when someone is “voted up”, they are immediately executed once majority is reached, so ensure that you stand behind your vote!
Forum players use a specific lingo and some common abbreviations can be found in the following link:
https://wiki.mafiascum.net/index.php?title=Commonly_Used_Abbreviations
Remember, when in doubt, ask the hosts in your classcard: Solic and Datbird

Solic are you ok

item.title: [FoL] FoL 22 - The Blue Dragon and Scorned Win!
item.dc:creator: sulit
item.description:
/shrug
Like Gikkle said, on our site awards don’t really mater too much. If you get one, it’s just like letting you know you did well. Makes the receiver feel happy and accomplished. It’s usually rewarded to people that make good reads and push them. Active in thread, etc. We never really count them, giving out awards is just a fun thing to do endgame. Never really take them too seriously. Hosts give em out.

Woo

Read full topic

It might be a good idea to try a few games under the current system, and tweak it if it turns out to have significant problems.

I’d say Arete said it best. If it doesn’t work out, we chuck it or change it.

item.title: [FoL] FoL 22 - The Blue Dragon and Scorned Win!
item.dc:creator: Gikkle
item.description:
Do awards hold weight or something here? On my site, hosts are the ones who give out awards, but they don’t really mean anything, and are nothing but “Virtual Bragging Rights”, and people don’t really care about them on my site. I have around 4 “best” awards on my site, but I don’t really pay attention to them much or really consider them when playing on there. Since y’all are debating about how to give out awards and taking it super seriously, I’m wondering if awards actually have some kind of importance here.

Read full topic

item.title: [FoL] FoL 22 - The Blue Dragon and Scorned Win!
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
It’s smart to always ISO quickly whoever you involve in your night actions. It doesn’t take too much time in that way, but you still ensure your mechanical play is on point. This way you ensure you kill somebody that you really do read as scum or you protect someone you really do think is town. You did do it on a conversion night, so props for that.

Read full topic
